graph_get_all_edges(+Graph, -EdgeList)

Returns a sorted list of all edges in the graph
Graph
a graph structure
EdgeList
a list of e/3 edge structures

Description

See Also

graph_get_adjacent_edges / 3, graph_get_incoming_edges / 3, graph_get_maxnode / 2
